name: Autopolis
description:
City building game without money

Gain 10000 population in your city as fast as possible by operating and moving different building types:

 Residential Building - holding population (energy required)

 Power Plant - providing energy in an area

 Constructor - building and upgrading buildings in an area (energy required)

Controls:

  • Left mouse click on a building shows its stats and area of effect
  • Right mouse click on a building selects it to move it to an other tile (don't hold the button). Move around the mouse to select the new tile and then press left mouse button to apply the new location. Right mouse click to cancel.

Created for the Game Maker's Toolkit Jam 2018 in 48 hours.
